con:interface.name: EnterpriseSalesManagementRESTSvc
con:interface.con:description: This service provides the interface for getting information required to build the ESS shopping cart, and submit the sales

con:method.name: bookAppointment
con:method.con:description: Books the appointment based on the products selected

con:method.name: getPrice
con:method.con:description: Get price for the cart items in the shopping cart. Returns pricing based on teh context of the shopping cart.
